name: Snakes Rule!
text: Food was amazing, food was delivered soon after ordering, when the pizza was delivered it was still hot! BEST PIZZA I HAVE EVER TASTED!

name: Jayson Maurer
text: As a covid19 positive individual - just called for delivery and was told they can't drive 7 miles or 11 mins to bring food. Woman was so disgustingly catty and snide on phone it was ridiculous. I will definitely not contribute to this location of Hungry Howies ever again.

name: Audrey Goschke
text: We ordered delivery to a local hotel. Received our food with no napkins or silverware, order included a salad. Not fun to eat with our fingers. None of the pizzas, cheese bread, or desert cookie were cut. That also wasn‚Äôt fun ripping everything apart with our fingers. Not impressed at all with the amount of money I spent.

name: Marshell Danielson
text: Great food and great service.  We had a very large order and it was done quickly.  This is the best pizza I have ever eaten.

name: Phyllis Gross
text: Our favorite pizza!

text: I have had a few bad experiences at this location. First, I got home and my cheese bread was not cut at all. On another visit, they didn‚Äôt completely cut through my pizza and didn‚Äôt give me the sauces I paid for online. Although, the taste isn‚Äôt bad.

name: Bear Snyder
text: They have great hot wings.

name: chad frederick
text: Cant even place a order . They play 50 questions before they take order . Then if you dont hear them correctly and answer quick enough.  Sorry you timed out . What kind of service is this .

name: Trish Jones
text: When ordering online u get points. I have received 2 free med pizzas for doing this so far.

name: Allen Bratcher
text: We had an order delivered last week no issue.  Today we call and placed an order, they made no mention while ordering that delivering to our address would be an issue but then call back 20 minutes after the order was placed and paid for to ‚Ä¶More

text: It is excellent

name: Kelsea
text: I have only ate at this location once, so I do not know how much stock anyone should put into my review, but I would probably not eat here again. I called ahead and ordered two pizzas, to be ready in 30 minutes- I didn't arrive until 45 ‚Ä¶More

name: Shann Mackety
text: Always good food and service

name: Zoe Goddard
text: Carry out seems to be the best option. The food is delicious and filling. I highly suggest their subs and salads. This place has good prices compared to most pizza places and great deals in their online codes and mail coupons. Hungry Howie's is tasty AF; great comfort food. üòçüòçüòçüòç

name: Rita Laninga
text: Amazing different  selection of different flavored bread sticks. Great service.

name: Katelyn Allen
text: Absolutely terrible experience. I got my pizza and when I opened the boxes both pizzas were smashed to the side of the box and one of the pizzas was completely burnt on one side. I'm not thrilled what so ever. This is the first Hungry Howie's I've ordered from that I've had such a terrible experience with.

name: Navene Sowmick
text: Love the service inside the store.  They always are so polite.  Love the Howie Bread.

name: Joe Schupback
text: Good pizza and great delivery people

name: Donna Sinclair
text: Just picked up our pizzas, one was cut and the other wasn't.

name: Charley Mccoy
text: Food is decent, just wish they could get orders right! And I wouldn't add extra toppings to the subs, never seems to be more than regular!

name: Jack Fowler
text: Ordered the 15 dollar meal pizza was great people that work there were great also would recommend

name: Karen Lytle
text: Took an hour for delivery. Less than a mile away. Crust was soggy, to point of being wet. Box was warped and it was stuck to the bottom, at least to what was on the bottom of the box. It was clearly visible, that it had been dropped on its side, with only three pieces left unscaved. Sorry i tipped

text: Pizza came partially crushed, didn't give me my dipping sauce, when I called they said my phone number wasn't in their system (even though they called me on said phone 5 minutes earlier) and when they did finally find my order they informed ‚Ä¶More

text: Normally they're ok. I ordered a half hour before close which I normally wouldn't do anywhere but I live very close. I ordered everything well done and they clearly pulled everything out of the oven early. I understand your trying to get ‚Ä¶More

text: Very disappointed! Went in to order at 10:50pm and could not find anyone to take our order. After opening the door 5-6 times( so the bell would ring) and waiting 5-10 minutes with no one coming to the counter we left. Employees could be ‚Ä¶More

text: Tyler was terrific when I picked up. If you spend $5 or $50 they treat you well.

name: Eric McVeigh
text: This establishment is hurting the Hungry Howie's image. I have been burned there more than once. Either what I ordered (which is what usually keeps me going back for more) is undercooked or burned. My last visit they charged me full topping ‚Ä¶More

name: Jme Lu
text: I Google the resturaunt online, it said they were open until 12 am on tuesdays, so I call to place an order, and the phone  just rang and rang. I then called back 2 other times and finally got an answer to "I'm sorry, we're closed"?????   Then why does it say that they are open until 12 am on the website???  Not happy....
